article: moscow backed off from a threat to send troops thursday into the breakaway republic of chechnya , where leaders defied the kremlin 's ultimatum and called on armed volunteers to defend their capital .
abstract: moscow backs off threat as ultimatum expires

leaders defied the kremlin 's ultimatum and called on armed volunteers to defend their capital.
